name: Hackuna Nier Automatata
description:
SHOOT!!

But most of all, AVOID getting shot and STAY. ALIVE.

Short shooter game made as part of Unity gamedev classes (week 1), inspired by Nier Automata's hacking sequences. It's still glitchy in places and not well balanced, I was still learning (and still am) so please try to keep that in mind.

Controls:

  • MOVE
    • Left stick
  • AIM
    • Right stick
  • SHOOT
    • Right trigger
  • LOAD (the title screen, after the game ends or it ends you)
    • Left trigger

...ok ok, you can also quit the game with Alt + F4 if that's what you REALLY want. No, I'm not mad. Just disappointed.
